title: CoverageOutput
description: Analysis coverage metadata including self-skip and scan statistics

mode.description: Acquisition mode used for this analysis

scanned.description: Number of files indexed and included in evidence packs

skipped.description: Number of files skipped (self-skip, binary, etc.)

is_replit.description: Whether target was identified as a Replit workspace

enabled.description: Whether self-skip was active (analyzer detected itself in target)

excluded_file_count.description: Number of files excluded by self-skip
